data.message: I don't understand it is it 1 billion using it yesterday at the same day or 1 billion downloaders? ??? I'm confused

replies.message: There are currently 1 billion active users on Facebook every day, Rana.  -Adriana

Facebook  so average over time if so how long and by active users does that mean daily or a certain amount of time, just for my curiosity, Congrats on the milestone that proves how much effort FB puts into connecting people safer, faster, easier and consistently!  Thank You!!!
George Riley Jr. NEW SLOGAN OR TAG LINES! "Facebook Connecting People Easier/Faster/Safer/Consistently. Cause We Care!" Not that you need my help just sounds good and true!
